DescriptionEvelyn: The simplest spread. Useful for quick decisions on the go, or prompting you to make a firm decision. Sometimes you just need an answer.
DescriptionMadame: A single card for a quick question. See how the picture makes you feel and let go of your preconceptions. Trust your emotions
DescriptionMaledictus: Just get one. Longer spreads are for slow digestion, this is a snack.

DescriptionEvelyn: Use this spread for questions about love and whether to break up with your boyfriend
DescriptionMadame: Use this spread for questions about love and whether to break up with your boyfriend

Slots: Your Talents;Your Calling;The Challenge;Where To Seek Advice;What You Should Do

DescriptionMaledictus: Most people live in the time dimension

DescriptionEvelyn: Decide in advance what these will represent, no cheating! Some choose the past, present, and future. Others choose problem, cause, and solution. The three card spread can tell you almost anything. A spread for love might represent you, the other person, and the nature of your relationship.
DescriptionMadame: The three card spread is good when your query is more open-ended. You might use it to visualise the future; for instance a spread for manifestation might represent where you are now, what you are looking for, and how you should get there.
DescriptionMaledictus: Three cards is enough to answer most questions. Think about a mistake you made (extra credit if it’s really awkward): a spread for the past might represent what went wrong, what went right and what you should learn from the experience.

DescriptionEvelyn: Use this for any kind of spread you want. The Internet has some great suggestions if you’re looking for more detail, sometimes a few cards just isn’t enough.
DescriptionMadame: Use this for deeper, more nuanced readings. There are always more layers to every situation. Why not try a five or seven card spread?
DescriptionMaledictus: The full deck. It’s tempting to just draw until you get the answer you want. Not that I’m telling you what to do, or anything.
